name: Cursed Temple
description:
Help Alia to avoid a world chaos killing all the cursed mummies that want to get out the temple!

Cursed temple is a game done in a personal one game a week challenge.

For more information about next one week games check my twitter : https://twitter.com/Paco_S

Game music : http://freesound.org/people/moatdd/sounds/268603/
